item.title: Reference Letters for Students in Classes
item.description: I will not provide reference letters for students that I know only through a class (as a student). I get many requests from students from my classes to provide reference letters for graduate school applications. I will not provide these letters. I will provide letters for students that I get to know outside of regular classes. For example, if you are involved in a directed study project or work with me as a peer mentor for a class (that’s why it says “as a student”).
